all.subject: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Orwell
all.object: His non-fiction works, including The Road to Wigan Pier (1937 ), documenting his experience of working-class life in industrial Northern England, and Homage to Catalonia (1938 ), an account of his experiences soldiering for the Republican faction of the Spanish Civil War (1936–1939 )
